attributes.action: Provide Students with Fair Complaints Hearings that do not breach their Human Rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: University Complaints Hearings are dishonest and unfair. Ban University employees  from sitting on so called 'independent' panels. Allow Students the right to legal representation and make legal funding available. It is wrong for a University to have their lawyer/s on Panels while refusing students legal representation. Make University staff personally responsible for their actions. Allow students the right to elect their hearings to be held in public.
